about_the_game:
You wake up from a dream; a girl stands beside you. The world is surrounded by dark, and you aren't unfamiliar with it. The game is a semi-idle game. battles progress automatically. You can choose to completely idle and enjoy the gradual progression, or intervene to a certain extent (how much is entirely up to you) to accelerate progress (how fast also entirely up to you). Your task is to utilize resources dropped in dungeons to become stronger and defeat stronger enemies. The main dungeon's progress will trigger Shireo's stories, through which you learn about the background unfolding in this world.

Intervenable Combat Elements

Rhythm Bar: Each enemy attack generates a rhythm block. Pressing space at the right time provides significant damage reduction for that attack.


OD Bar: Various actions in combat accumulate the OD bar. When the OD bar is full, it activates the Overdrive Mode. In this mode, time freezes completely, allowing you to attack indefinitely without worrying about enemy spells.

Drops

Most monsters drop various resources, including money and materials.


Bosses will drop equipment with special effects, making battles easier and more engaging. Moreover, using materials to upgrade equipment items can greatly enhance your character.

Shops

Through Shireo's shop, you can purchase many useful items.

Skill Tree

There are various branches in the talent skill tree, and you can prioritize which direction you want to strengthen. They can have significant effects on enhancing character strength, and the special talents within are even more powerful.

Traning Room

In Shireo's training room, you can use "CLICK" to collect the world energy, which can enhance your strength and craft numerous useful items.

Story Unlocking

When you pass certain specific floors in main dungeon, a question mark will appear on Shireo.
Talking to Shireo triggers stories. Conversations with Shireo also result in ability enhancements and insights into the secrets of this world.




Head towards the highest floor of the main dungeon—Bloody Castle!

  • OS: Windows 10, 11

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: A highly flexible semi-automatic idle game where you can intervene in battles and character development to have a huge boost up. Also, through conversations between the protagonists, you'll hear a story steeped in the past, narrating the origins of them.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
